thread.title: Rangoon box office collection day 1: Shahid Kapoor, Kangana Ranaut and Saif Ali Khan has a disappointing first day, earns just Rs 6.07 crore
thread.title_full: Rangoon box office collection day 1: Shahid Kapoor, Kangana Ranaut and Saif Ali Khan has a disappointing first day, earns just Rs 6.07 crore

author: Karan Shah
title: Rangoon box office collection day 1: Shahid Kapoor, Kangana Ranaut and Saif Ali Khan has a disappointing first day, earns just Rs 6.07 crore
text:
How Saif Ali Khan’s lookalike lured a woman using fake Tinder account – read shocking details 
Shahid Kapoor , Kangana Ranaut and Saif Ali Khan’s Rangoon has released, but looks like it hasn’t had the best of starts at the box office. The film has managed to earn just Rs 6.07 crore on day one, which is disappointing to say the least. While we had revealed to you how the movie had recorded a disastrous occupancy of just 10-15 per cent on day 1, we can now confirm that it has also had a poor start in terms of collections. While talking about the collections, trade analyst Taran Adarsh emphasised on the fact that Rangoon needs to grow over the first weekend to sustain at the box office. As he tweeted, “#Rangoon has a dismal start… Fri ₹ 6.07 cr. India biz… Will need to show massive growth on Sat + Sun to sustain and survive.” 
In fact, Rangoon was one of the most interesting films of the year with a great star-studded cast. However, looks like lady luck hasn’t been kind to the movie. The average buzz and mixed reviews might have hindered the start, but there is still some hope. With people starting to talk about the fantastic performances delivered by Shahid, Kangana and Saif, a decent word of mouth publicity might develop and help the film grow over the weekend. ALSO READ – Rangoon movie review: Kangana Ranaut, Shahid Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan’s earnest performances make Vishal Bhardwaj’s film worthy 
Our trade expert, Amul Mohan (editor of Super Cinema) had predicted a Rs 6 crore opening yesterday and looks like he was bang on target. Speaking to us exclusively, he had mentioned, “ Rangoon has got a slow start, but these kind of movies pick up later. Generally these kind of films pick up more in the evening shows and I guess Rangoon can make anywhere above Rs 6 crore on day one. But then, it can always increase because of the evening shows.” ALSO READ – 5 films that crossed my mind while watching Shahid Kapoor, Kangana Ranaut’s Rangoon 
For those of you who don’t know, Rangoon is a period drama. A love triangle brews between a soldier (Shahid), a stage performer (Kangana) and a shrewd business ( Saif ) in a backdrop of World War II and the Indian Independence movement. So expect a lot of action, drama and suspense when you go in to watch the movie. Anyway, if you have already seen Rangoon , share with us your thoughts in the comments section below!
